name: CPC
tagline: CPC is a history and files removal program, it erase unwanted and unnecessary items on your computer.  With CPC you can erase items that are created automatically and are temporarily cached on your system. This frees up space on your hard drive and improves computer performance
body:
# CPC - CoEIA Privacy Control

CPC provides easy and efficient methods of finding and erasing unwanted and unnecessary items on your computer. With CPC you can erase items that are created automatically and are temporarily cached on your system. This frees up space on your hard drive and improves computer performance.

CPC cleans your hard drive of unwanted files. It features full support to erase files related to Internet Explorer, Firefox, VLC, Skype, DivX, BitTorrent and about 200 others software.

# Supported Programs (Categories)
1. Windows Cache and History
1. Internet Browsing History
1. Chat and Instant Messaging History
1. MS-Office History
1. Multimedia History
1. File Sharing History
1. Email Trash
1. Desktop Search History
1. Toolbars Application History
1. Security Application History
1. Download and Upload History
1. Third-Party Application History
